doc.title: RIL

value.content: RIL (Radio Interface Layer) is a mobile operating system component which communicates between the device's software and the device's phone, radio, or modem hardware.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Radio Interface Layer on Wikipedia

doc.summary: RIL (Radio Interface Layer) is a mobile operating system component which communicates between the device's software and the device's phone, radio, or modem hardware.
